Master of Science in Engineering Diploma

Completed undergraduate studies and have a recognized Bachelor’s degree.
Digital Signal Processor Architecture and Programming

Academic credits earned at Lublin University of Technology and Warsaw University of Technology are awarded under the higher education system of Poland. For the purpose of this evaluation, Polish academic credits have been converted to U.S. semester credit hours based on a review of total instructional time, academic level, and the presence of laboratory or practical components. In general, one Polish academic credit (ECTS) is considered comparable to 0.5 to 0.75 U.S. semester credit hours, in accordance with internationally accepted credential evaluation practices and AACRAO guidelines.
